# ErrorCodeExceptionInfo

**Type Property**

An integer error code for debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
static let ErrorCodeExceptionInfo: String
```

## Discussion

This key will appear in an exception’s dictionary. Its value will be an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber].
